title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Accelerating Real-World Evidence Generation in Life Sciences (IND202)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 加速生命科学领域的真实世界证据生成 (IND202)
abstract: Life sciences organizations are transforming healthcare data analysis using Amazon Web Services (AWS). By converting real-world data (RWD) into real-world evidence (RWE) through AWS Clean Rooms and the Real-World Data Insights Generating Agent, companies can make faster, more informed decisions. Learn how partnerships with companies like Datavant are enabling companies to streamline their data acquisition, analysis, and collaboration processes. This advancement accelerates evidence generation and supports more efficient clinical development decision-making.
abstract_cn: 生命科学组织正在使用Amazon Web Services (AWS)转变医疗数据分析。通过AWS Clean Rooms和真实世界数据洞察生成代理将真实世界数据(RWD)转换为真实世界证据(RWE),企业可以更快速、更明智地做出决策。了解与Datavant等公司的合作如何帮助企业简化数据获取、分析和协作流程。这一进步加速了证据生成,并支持更高效的临床开发决策。

presenter.name: Anne Evans
presenter.title: Healthcare & Life Sciences Go-to-Market Strategic Program Lead
